Sentence.sentence: As anyone who has tried to lose weight knows, realistic goal-setting generally produces the best results.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The weight of the boxes moving across the stage.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Health experts advise that the average woman should consume about 2,000 calories a day and a man about 2,500 calories to maintain a healthy weight.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The WCRF has estimated that 19,000 cancers a year in Britain could be prevented if people lost their excess weight with growing evidence that excess body fat increases the risk of various cancers
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What could British people expect if they maintain a normal body weight according to the WCRF?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Additional protein was found to help strengthen the muscles of overweight seniors seeking weight loss.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: All 67 participants were over 60 years of age, and both groups lost about the same amount of weight.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: And a 2015 study from the University of California, Berkeley, found that teens who go to bed late are more likely to gain weight over a five-year period.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: Body weight was not hugely different between the groups eating a healthy diet and those on high and sugar diets.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: But now a systematic review and analysis of studies by Canadian researchers found that not only does pasta not cause weight gain, but three meals a week can help people drop more than half a kilogram over four months.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In fact, analysis actually showed a small weight loss.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Pasta is no longer off the menu, after a new review of studies suggested that the carbohydrate can form part of a healthy diet, and even help people lose weight.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: So this shows negative consequences of poor dietary intake can occur even when body weight has not changed conspicuously.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Starr recently conducted a small study that found that adding extra protein foods to the diet of obese older individuals who were trying to lose weight strengthened their muscles.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In weighing the evidence, we can now say with some confidence that pasta does not have an adverse effect on body weight outcomes when it is consumed as part of a healthy dietary pattern.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Thus, body weight is not always the best indicator of health and a thin person still needs to eat well and exercise regularly.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, that conclusion puts too much weight on a useful, but flawed and incomplete, statistic.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When considering risk factors associated with serious chronic diseases, we often think about health indicators such as cholesterol, blood pressure, and body weight.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: I came to believe that I could do nothing about my weight.

Sentence.sentence: I didn't want to live the rest of my life with this extra weight any more.

Sentence.sentence: In modern man, the brain accounts for about 2-3%of total body weight but it consumes 25% of the body's energy when the body is at rest.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Joe's weight was pulling simon slowly towards the precipice.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Of course, I also took some practical steps to lose weight.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Researchers have found that there is a direct link between the increase in food eaten outside the home and the rise in weight problems.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Say your cat weight 5kg and eats one can of food each day.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: That's 219kg of steel-more tan a fifth of a ton and more than 40 times the cat's weight.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: In musical expression, he did not feel restrained by the weight of convention.

Sentence.sentence: An adult with a Bmi of 18 to 25 is often considered to be normal weight.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: I had gained weight in the form of muscle mass, but thinking only of  lowering the number on the scale, I altered my training program.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: If my training intensity remains the same, but I'm constantly hungry and dropping weight, this is a sign that I need to increase my daily caloric intake.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Many employers have instituted weight loss and fitness initiatives.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Obesity is probably less a matter of weight than body fat.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: since weight loss is not my goal, it is less important for me to track my weight each week.

Sentence.sentence: Weighing every other week allows me to observe and account for any significant weight changes.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Weighing yourself regularly is a wonderful way to stay aware of any significant weight fluctuations.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

phrase.cizu_name: be worth one's weight in gold

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a person) exceedingly useful or helpful
According to weight rather than volume or other measure.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 按重量：按照重量而不是容积或其它计量法

entry.def: The weight of a person or thing is how heavy they are, measured in units such as kilograms, pounds, or tons.

example.ex: What is your height and weight?...
example.tran: 你的身高和体重是多少？

example.ex: This reduced the weight of the load...
example.tran: 这减轻了负荷的重量。

entry.def: A person's or thing's weight is the fact that they are very heavy.

example.ex: His weight was harming his health...
example.tran: 他体重过重，这有损他的健康。

example.ex: Despite the vehicle's size and weight it is not difficult to drive.
example.tran: 尽管车子很大很重，但它一点都不难开。

entry.def: If you move your weight, you change position so that most of the pressure of your body is on a particular part of your body.

example.ex: He shifted his weight from one foot to the other...
example.tran: 他把重心从一只脚转到另一只脚上。

example.ex: He kept the weight from his left leg.
example.tran: 他一直不让左腿受力。

entry.def: Weights are objects which weigh a known amount and which people lift as a form of exercise.

example.ex: I was in the gym lifting weights.
example.tran: 我在健身房举哑铃。

entry.def: Weights are metal objects which weigh a known amount and which are used on a set of scales to weigh other things.
You can refer to a heavy object as a weight, especially when you have to lift it.

example.ex: Straining to lift heavy weights can lead to a rise in blood pressure.
example.tran: 用力提重物会导致血压升高。

entry.def: If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example in order to stop it from moving easily.

example.ex: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
example.tran: 可以把它缝到窗帘的褶边里增加重量，使窗帘更有垂感。

entry.def: If you weight things, you give them different values according to how important or significant they are.

example.ex: ...a computer program which weights the different transitions according to their likelihood...
example.tran: 根据可能性的大小对不同转换进行加权处理的电脑程序

example.ex: This takes account of the number of countries in which a company wins approval for a new drug, weighted by the size of each country's market.
example.tran: 这考虑到了允许一家公司的新药在本国上市的国家的数量，并依照每个国家的市场规模权衡其重要性。

entry.def: If something is given a particular weight, it is given a particular value according to how important or significant it is.

example.ex: The scientists involved put different weight on the conclusions of different models...
example.tran: 相关科学家对不同模型的结论给予不同的权重。

example.ex: We had this understanding that courses were roughly the same weight.
example.tran: 我们已经了解到各门功课差不多一样重要。

entry.def: If you talk about the weight of something, you mean that it is large in amount or has great power, which means that it is difficult to oppose or fight against.

example.ex: The weight of expectation was getting to them...
example.tran: 他们逐渐感觉到了期望带来的压力。

example.ex: Companies found themselves collapsing under the weight of debts.
example.tran: 许多公司发现自己因债台高筑而濒临倒闭。

entry.def: If someone or something gives weight to what a person says, thinks, or does, they emphasize its significance.

example.ex: The fact that he is gone has given more weight to fears that he may try to launch a civil war...
example.tran: 他已经离开这一事实让人更担心他会发动一场内战。

example.ex: Do you think, perhaps, that what happened today might lend weight to that criticism?
example.tran: 你觉得今天发生的事情可能会使那种批评加剧吗？

entry.def: If you give something or someone weight, you consider them to be very important or influential in a particular situation.

example.ex: Consumers generally place more weight on negative information than on the positive when deciding what to buy.
example.tran: 消费者在决定要买什么东西的时候往往更重视负面消息，而不是正面消息。

example.ex: ...the overwhelming weight Freud assigned parents in our development.
example.tran: 弗洛伊德认为父母在我们的成长过程中所起到的举足轻重的作用

entry.def: If you feel a weight on you, you have a problem or a responsibility that is difficult for you to manage and that you are very worried about.

example.ex: The relief was indescribable. It was freedom after years of slavery. A great weight lifted from me.
example.tran: 如释重负的感觉是难以言喻的。这是受多年奴役之后的自由。我卸下了一个重担。

entry.def: If a person or their opinion carries weight, they are respected and are able to influence people.

example.ex: That argument no longer carries as much weight...
example.tran: 那个论点不再具有那么大的影响力了。

example.ex: Senator Kerry carries considerable weight in Washington.
example.tran: 参议员克里在华盛顿举足轻重。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is worth their weight in gold, you are emphasizing that they are so useful, helpful, or valuable that you feel you could not manage without them.

example.ex: Any successful manager is worth his weight in gold.
example.tran: 任何一个成功的管理者都是千金难求的。

entry.def: If you pull your weight, you work as hard as everyone else who is involved in the same task or activity.

example.ex: He accused the team of not pulling their weight.
example.tran: 他指责这个团队没有尽到本分。

entry.def: If someone throws their weight around or throws their weight about, they act aggressively and use their authority over other people more than they need to.
If you throw your weight behind a person, plan, or campaign, you use all your influence and do everything you can to support them.
entry.tran: （利用自己的影响等）全力相助，鼎力支持

example.ex: The administration is throwing its full weight behind the UN plan.
example.tran: 该政府正鼎力支持这项联合国计划。

means.word_mean: 1. the vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity
2. sports equipment used in calisthenic exercises and weightlifting; a weight that is not attached to anything and is raised and lowered by use of the hands and arms
3. the relative importance granted to something;
5. an oppressive feeling of heavy force;

sentences.sentence: "bowed down by the weight of responsibility"

means.word_mean: 6. a system of units used to express the weight of something
7. a unit used to measure weight;

sentences.sentence: "he placed two weights in the scale pan"

means.word_mean: 8. (statistics) a coefficient assigned to elements of a frequency distribution in order to represent their relative importance

sentences.sentence: "He biased his presentation so as to please the share holders"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English (ge)wiht, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wicht and German Gewicht. The form of the word has been influenced by weigh

Sentence.sentence: Researchers from the University of Surrey and University of Aberdeen are halfway through research looking into the mechanisms behind how the time we eat influences body weight.
